CustomField.description: Lead Reason when the Lead Stage is set to "Lost" for Lost Reasons other than 'Bad Email', 'Bad Phone', 'Bad Email & Bad Phone', and 'Changed Organization'. Created this field for reporting purposes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Lead Reason when the Lead Stage is set to "Lost" for Lost Reasons other than 'Bad Email', 'Bad Phone', 'Bad Email & Bad Phone', and 'Changed Organization'. Created this field for reporting purposes.
CustomField.label: Reason for Lost
